scripts.browserify: browserify --verbose -t [ babelify ] -t [ stylify ] -g uglifyify src/index.js -o dist/index.js
scripts.watchify: watchify --verbose --debug -t [ babelify ] -t [ stylify ] -p browserify-notify src/index.js -o dist/index.js
scripts.push-gh-pages: git status -s | grep '.' && echo 'you should commit before push-gh-pages' || (git add -f ./dist && git commit -m 'push gh-pages' && git push -f origin HEAD:gh-pages; git reset --hard HEAD^)
